projects.projectDescription: The Mineral Particle Analysis System automates digital image processing to calculate geometric metrics: smallest encapsulating circle, surface area, major axis, perimeter, and centroid location. These data points provide critical insights into particle size, elongation, spatial distribution, and contour characteristics.
PasterBot is a GUI Tool that allows users to paste content in text fields where pasting is disabled, and can automate text input on their computer
This project contains a simple implementation of a bigram language model using PyTorch. The model learns to predict the next character in a sequence based on the preceding character.
This is a bookmarker app, where you can store links that you find on the internet
This project focuses on using CNN & RNN ML and Deep Learning techniques to automatically categorize breast tissue samples as either malignant or benign
projects.projectTechStack: CNN, RNN, Machine Learning, Deep Learning
